document_data.name: Orion Goodbeard
document_data.mainbody: '''Orion Goodbeard''' was an inhabitant of [[Baldur's Gate]] who died some years before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Orion Goodbeard died sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1486}} and was buried in the [[Lower City Graveyard]], next to the [[Grand Mausoleum]], sharing a grave with [[Alexer Goodbeard]]. The two were known of their explorations of the [[Shadowfell]]. Their shred gravestone read: "Adventurers Alexer and Orion Goodbeard - Intrepid explorers of the Plane of Shadows." The Goodbeard grave may had been accidentally desecrated, and their bodies risen as a [[zombie]]s by [[Nina Dortmell]], a talented child with a [[gift]], who was trying to resurrect her recently deceased brother.
